title: Drawing, "Measurement Provisions for Setting of "All the World Wonder," Drawing No. 4", January 4, 1929
markings: Stamp in black ink, upper right: United Scenic Artists
signed: Signed in graphite, upper right: Henry Dreyfuss DESIGNER / 580 5th AVE. NEW YORK N.Y / TEL. BRYANT 8638
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left: DRAWING NO 4 [in a square] / DATE JAN. 4 1929; in black marking pen, lower right margin: THE LAST MILE
creditline: Gift of University of California, Los Angeles
description: Page with plan and taped on is a typed sheet of text explaining the plan.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Measurement Provisions for Setting of "All the World Wonder," Drawing No. 4", January 4, 1929.
January 4, 1929. Graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of University of California, Los Angeles. 1973-15-118.
